Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are experiencing delays. Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are experiencing delays. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

 Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are experiencing delays. Expect longer than usual wait times.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are experiencing delays. Expect longer than usual wait times.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cermak. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier police activity at Cermak.

 Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
